Class WhoisCommand

    public class WhoisCommand
extends Command
    Sends a WHOIS request to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • server

        @Nonnull
public WhoisCommand server(@Nullable
                                     String server)
        Sets the server to query.

        It's commonly possible to specify the user's nick here instead of a server, which will cause the IRC daemon to automatically send it to the user's current server.

        Parameters:
        server - server to query or null to not specify one
        Returns:
        this command

      • target

        @Nonnull
public WhoisCommand target(@Nonnull
                                     String target)
        Sets the target nickname for the command.
        Parameters:
        target - target nick
        Returns:
        this command
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - for invalid target
